Functions¶

app_folder.routes.accountHomePage()¶

Displays all meeting date, time, guest, and description

Changelog:

Dylan 5/3: Created initial implementation Dylan 5/11: Properly queries databases and shows only future events.

app_folder.routes.availableTimes(username, date)¶

Redirect to display available times Changelog:

Ali, Dylan 5/3: Initial implementation Dylan 5/11: Properly displays times

app_folder.routes.createaccount()¶

Create account page Changelog:

Isaac 04/19: establishment of page excluding database implementation Dylan 5/3: Adds user to database Dylan 5/10: Password encryption

app_folder.routes.delete()¶

Deletes user from database

Changelog:

Dylan 5/3: Database functionality added Dylan 5/10: Password encryption

app_folder.routes.guestPage(username)¶

Directs to a calendar that has information on the user’s availability Changelog:

Ali, Dylan 5/3: Initial implementation Dylan 5/11: Properly gains date information

app_folder.routes.index()¶

Returns the rendered ‘index.html’ template. Parameters:

none

Returns:

render_template(‘index.html’): the rendered version of the index HTML page, which has the website title, a link to the login page, and a link to the create-account page

Changelog:

Saima 4/19: created homepage in index.html

app_folder.routes.login()¶

Create address for Login page Returns to:

login.html. forms.py for LoginForm class. Sign In

Changelog:

4/19 Ali Dylan 4/19: Added session username, changed flash message Dylan 5/3: session[‘username’] receiving different data to fix a bug Dylan 5/10: Password encryption

app_folder.routes.logout()¶

Pops the session username Changelog:

Dylan 4/19: Created initial implementation

app_folder.routes.settings()¶

Deletes user from database

Changelog:

Dylan 5/11: Now actually changes user settings

app_folder.routes.splash()¶

Returns the rendered ‘splash_page.html’ template. Parameters:

none

Returns:

the splash page ot the website, contains details about what the site does as well as pictures outlining each feature

Changelog:

Isaac 5/10: created splash page in splash_page.html

class app_folder.models.Event(**kwargs)¶

Event database @id unique id required for database @user_id user’s id that the event is for @datetime date and time of the meeting @guest_name name input by the person requesting the meeting @description description of the meeting
